name: Food Fight Fiesta: Multi-Use Cards
description: Multi-Use Cards: Eat Food to Heal, Throw them to Attack. No more dead hands! Start with 8 cards and battle through 13 challenging levels. Collect and combine over 200 unique cards to create thousands of powerful builds.

name: Myrmidon
description: Invite a friend online and embark on a puzzle-platformer adventure exploring the bond between an animator and his puppet. Work together to clear obstacles across the sprawling sets of a stop-motion animation workshop and find out to what lengths the power of imagination can take you.

name: Dead Beats Survivors
description: A 2D shooting survivor game! Survive in a dark, zombie-infested underground disco and earn money!

name: No.8 High School
description: You've returned to your high school classroom, where time seems to stand still. You need to look around and find something unusual to get through the last 30 days of school.

name: Hirai Nya
description: Step into a combat-free Metroidvania world where your adventure revolves around exploration, puzzle-solving, and treasure hunt.

name: Thousand Lantern Lane
description: On a dreary, rainy night, you and your girlfriend find yourselves lost in a desolate Japanese-style town. The streets are empty, with only the sound of rain tapping against old tiles and stone pavements. It is said that this town harbors ancient secrets.

name: Fish-Click Squad!
description: Fish-Click Squad! is a casual multiplayer idler where you purchase various aquatic creatures and nurture them to maturity with your friends through clicking and touching earning coins and rewards to unlock more fish and idle features! There is nothing happier than slacking with friends!

name: Argebe
description: A deliberately simplistic strategy game about equal opportunities and outplaying your opponents with stone cold logic

name: JusTD
description: Tower Defense with resource- and base management! Waves of enemy robots with special abilities, shield and armor! Mining, refining and production for building and repairing! Environmental hazards and the best: the Orbital strike!

name: Balloon Friends
description: Sin descripción

name: Unpatterned Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Buck Hunter: Ultimate Trophy
description: 3X THE CONTENT OF ANY PREVIOUS BIG BUCK HUNTER CONSOLE OFFERING!

name: Cat Spotting Challenge!
description:
Which One Is the Ragdoll?
A Relaxing & Brain-Training Game That’s Fun and Educational!

name: Ecchi Uncover
description: Time to sweep some girls off their feet.

name: Jonah Lomu Rugby Challenge 4
description: READY FOR THE CROSS-KICK?

name: Little Paws: Kitty Cat Simulator
description: Tiny Paws, Big Adventures – Explore, Play, Relax!

name: Miko x Miko Sisters: Kagura-kei no Miko to Akuryou
description: Akira's unlucky encounter with an evil spirit throws his life into chaos. With the help of two beautiful shrine maiden sisters, he sets out to banish the spirit but...?

name: Cavorite
description: A wicked smart, 16-bit puzzler.

name: CleanPlay
description: Sin descripción

name: Pirate Trails
description: Arrr, hoist the sails and chart the course, for the gold won't bury itself!

name: Young Bird Endless Flight
description: Sin descripción

name: Race Track Maniacs
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixicharm: Starry Blast
description: Sin descripción

name: ActionCam: Supernatural Case
description:
Step into the shoes of a police officer investigating the mysterious disappearance of children. Enter the twisted world of a dangerous mind and uncover the truth.

See everything through a body camera. Every moment is recorded and later reviewed at the station to teach rookies how a real pro handles a case.

It feels real — the old, abandoned school, the dark corners, and hidden secrets. You can almost touch the worn walls and feel the cracks beneath your fingertips.

It’s terrifying — the madman is out there, lurking. Be careful with every step. Stay sharp. This place may look deserted, but it hides terrible secrets.

Pay close attention to the clues — they might lead you back to where it all began. Only you have the power to put an end to it. Open the door and step into the nightmare.

name: Ultimate Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Tennis Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Penguin Hotel 2: Snake Penguin Ambition
description: Sin descripción

name: ACA2 Neo Geo: The King of Fighters '98
description:
" THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98" is a fighting game released by SNK in 1998.
In the previous installment KOF '97, the story of the "Orochi Saga" reached its exciting conclusion. As a result, the next entry in the series THE KING OF FIGHTERS '98 was released as a dream match version of THE KING OF FIGHTERS Series.
It is one of the most popular and well known versions of the game, partially thanks to the many balance changes that received high praisessss from fans around the world.

name: Echoes of Eldoria
description: Sin descripción

name: Necroflora
description: A new evil has taken root - you. Become an ever-growing many-headed hydra. Feed upon your enemies, acquire powerful mutations and defeat the 4 kings and their armies.

name: Ediction
description:
Raised from the dead, a man whose life was riddled with pain is made to consider what his last words will be once again.

Ediction is a visual novel made for the Love + Attraction Jam 2025. It is a complete story, sitting at around 23k words. Please note that it contains and discusses heavy themes, particularly suicide, but also death, abuse, and body horror.

name: Prison Miners
description: You are condemned to darkness in the vast deserts. To survive, you must dig deeper every day with your team, improve your skills, and acquire powerful equipment. But remember… this mine is not just full of stones and ores. Stay alert to the dangers that await you. Dig, get stronger, and survive!

name: Story of Heterosexuality
description:
An artist's abstract attempt to articulate the experience of heterosexuality.

A segment from their artist statement: "What is heterosexuality? A preference? A biological trait? An orientation? A style of life? A philosophy? In my attempt to understand it, I have decided to make this game: Story of Heterosexuality. In so doing, I also wanted to feel what it is like to be a heterosexual and experience their struggles so as to become more empathetic with them, which makes this an 'empathy game'."

name: Toy Scrappers
description: Toy Scrappers is a thrilling chase-based horror game that can be played with up to 16 players. Some players take on the role of a killer attempting to capture others. Escape the madness and stay alive!

name: Fire: The First Dreamer
description: Uncover ancient secrets, summon totemic magic, decode enigmatic messages, and explore the majestic Preseli mountains of Wales in this open world adventure inspired by a true story. Dare to embark on this journey and rediscover the lost secrets of a life lived with purpose and meaning!

name: Realms of Pixel
description:
Embark on an epic journey in this classic pixel RPG mobile game!

This is a classic pixel RPG mobile game. Dive into nostalgic pixel art, strategic battles, and an engaging storyline. Build your lineup, explore vast worlds, and conquer challenging dungeons. Adventure awaits at your fingertips!

name: Inkwellers
description: Online 2 player co-op puzzle adventure game, you and your friend become the Inkwellers! Dwellers of stories who venture into journals to uncover their true meaning. With your friend, you'll explore hidden worlds, solve tricky puzzles, and uncover secrets.

name: Carte Blanche
description: Sin descripción

name: Merc Storia - The Healer and the Melody of the Heart
description: Sin descripción

name: Project: Mania
description: A mega collection of games and love letter to My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic

name: Pokémon Go: Might and Mastery
description: Sin descripción

name: Swingularity
description: An indie space golf game set across an infinite multiverse filled with stylized planets, stars, and other celestial wonders. Bogey, par, or birdie your way through tailored and procedurally generated courses. In Swingularity, the cosmos becomes your fairway.

name: Birdfull
description: Birdfull is a small relaxing idle game. Attract birds with feed, try to keep them longer, and discover all of them including the unique ones! Watch the birds, generate more eggs in real time, and customize your cozy bird space.

name: Pokémon Champions
description: Get ready to experience everything you love about Pokémon battles all in one place—in Pokémon Champions. This new, battle-focused game will feature familiar mechanics such as Pokémon types, Abilities, and moves, creating an environment conducive to rich and varied strategies for new and experienced Trainers alike. It’s not just familiar mechanics—you’ll be able to bring in classic Pokémon from Pokémon HOME, too! Look forward to cross-platform battles alongside your favorite Pokémon on Nintendo Switch and mobile, with a variety of different modes available for your desired experience.

name: Falling for Yaoguais
description: Drama! Crisis! And four charming or adorable Taiwanese Yaoguai(supernatural beings) love interests! Over 150 choices lead you through a romantic adventure—who will you choose? Or... will you choose them all?

name: Nightmare Of SilkenCore: Train Hell
description: Nightmare Of SilkenCore - Train Hell Step into the shoes of a journalist sent to a remote island to investigate a terrifying anomaly. Armed with a makeshift vehicle, you must collect four mysterious artifacts while avoiding Blinky, a malevolent living train, and other deadly creatures.

name: Insomnia
description: Dive into a world on the edge of death. Insomnia is a horror game mixed with urbex. Chose your path, your own story, survive and complete levels.

name: Chrono Tales
description: Chrono Tales is a Free 3D browser-based MMORPG. The new generation engine provides players with anime-styled 3D Graphics via browsers without huge downloads. Challenge immerse quests, tame mythological beasts, forge legendary gears and experience more! Chrono Tales is a free 3D browser-based MMORPG. The new generation engine provides players with anime-styled 3D graphics via browsers, without client download. Traveling through the time rift, players can explore in the fantasy world of Chrono Tales and save the realm from the resurgent evil. You can challenge immersive quest, forge legendary gear, tame mythological pets and experience much more mainstream MMO features in Chrono Tales.

name: Catagrams
description: Catagrams is a word puzzle game for iOS and Android, featuring charming illustrations, a relaxing challenge, and a cute cat theme.

name: The 8th Avenue
description: Endless looping streets, elusive anomalies, psychological and courage-testing pressure, the deeper you go, the clearer it becomes, integrate details to trigger multiple endings, success or failure hangs by a thread.

name: Stealth Strike
description: Gather together with up to 3 friends and sneak into banks and shops to rob them. Avoid guards and cameras to steal some valuables. But be careful - once the cops show up it's over!

name: Blades of Fire
description: Introducing Blades of Fire, an all-new action adventure that takes you across a beautiful world full of uncertainty and challenge. You take on the role of Aran de Lira, firstborn of the King’s Ward. The newly crowned Queen Nerea has cast a powerful spell that turns steel into stone and only her arms of abominations wield the divine metal against which other blades shatter…

name: Pandora's Doom: Apocalypse Hotline
description: Build your defenses, fortify your base, and battle relentless waves of alien invaders unleashed from Pandora's Box! Strategically place turrets, survive the onslaught, and save the planet!

name: Legend of Heroes: Three Kingdoms
description: "Legend of Heroes: Three Kingdoms" is a single-player RPG where you shape the Three Kingdoms era. Choose to be a ruler, a loyal advisor, or a cunning mercenary. Marry, build homes, or train in martial arts. Restore peace through diplomacy or conquer with mighty armies.

name: La Quimera
description: La Quimera is a story-driven FPS set in dystopian future Latin America. In a fractured world where microstates rely on mercenary forces, you are an operative caught in a web of lies and deception. Play alone or with up to two friends geared with futuristic weapons, exoskeletons and combat abilities.

name: Keep Deep Sheep
description: Some sheep in your flock require veterinary care. Unfortunately, these visits are not their favorite, making them unruly and difficult to handle. This arcade game calls for cleverness, dexterity but without any time pressure. Perfect for anyone who appreciates a dose of good humor.

name: Horg's Brewery
description: Foul-mouthed dwarves brewing beer and blasting enemies with rifles in the darkness.

name: Doki Doki Our Final Heartbeat
description: Doki Doki: Our Final Heartbeat is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club that takes players on an intense and dark emotional journey. Unlike the original experience, this mod delves even deeper into the characters' inner conflicts, exploring themes such as loss, sacrifice and redemption.

name: TechnoSorcery
description: TechnoSorcery is a rhythm arcade game with a focus on memorizing spells and casting them to a beat. Help the fledgling Sorcerer Aiden as he embarks on an impossible adventure of revenge. Show off your skills Online in 1v1 card battles with your own custom deck of cards.

name: The Empty Desk
description: Dive into a psychological thriller filled with adventure and puzzles, with touches of horror. Join Detective Bennett on his final case and unravel dark secrets in a world where reality twists and sanity crumbles.

name: Nina in Depravity
description:
Nina in Depravity is Nymph Circus first game.
A survival adventure where you control Nina, who is looking for her sister in a nightmarish manor.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Pack
description:
The DAIMA: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Pack includes the following content:
• DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Part 1 (July-Sep 2025)
• DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Part 2 (Jan-Mar 2026)
• DAIMA: Adventure Through the Demon Realm Pack Bonus
- Items: Ultimate Meat Feast, Mega Sacred Water, Purple Dino Horn, and Awakening Water

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Part 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Part 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot - Daima: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Bonus Pack
description:
The DAIMA: Adventure Through The Demon Realm Pack Bonus includes the following items:
- Ultimate Meat Feast
- Mega Sacred Water
- Purple Dino Horn
- Awakening Water

These items enhance character attributes.

name: Red or Blue
description: Red or Blue? Your choice decides life or death

name: The Well: Episode 1
description: The Well is a single-player, psychological horror game with a deep story and different puzzles. Hide, escape and make the right choices as you solve the terrifying mystery of the wells created in World War II. There is no exit from the wells in this village!

name: Pohinki Simulator
description: Pohinki Simulator is a survival game set in a polish neighbourhood, where you need to explore the open world in search for trash in order to survive and gain power. Explore the forgotten streets of Tarnow and find the treasures that others threw away in this abstract reality, filled with secrets waiting to be discovered.

name: House of Lost Souls
description: A long-standing pain has driven Jack back to the old family home in search of answers. Discover the terrible truth this house held and how it relates to what happened to his parents in the distant past.

name: Palm Cracker
description: Delve into a gripping world of puzzles, true ciphers on an old PalmPilot system. Will you uncover the Crypt Killer’s confession and bring him to justice, or will he escape the law?

name: Yasuke Simulator
description: Step into 1579 as Yasuke, the African samurai, and join Oda Nobunaga in his quest to unite Japan! Master precise katana combat, uncover secret gear, and unleash your ancestral power in this historically inspired action-packed journey through feudal Japan.

name: Can't Sleep!
description: This game is a Single Player Rougelike Deckbuilder includes 1 playable character. Player's goal is to reduce their soberness at Night by spending time to play cards. Player can also use stamina joining Activities to gain more cards and advantages at the Daytime after every Night.

name: Tracktopia
description: Tracktopia is a strategy game with city-building elements, where your city moves on tracks and serves as a super powerful unit. Expand it to boost production, advance technologies, and create smaller units to ultimately defeat the enemy nation!

name: Galactic Vanguard
description: Galactic Vanguard is a fast-paced, retro-style action shooter. Grab your weapons and eliminate relentless enemy forces and powerful alien creatures. Engage in intense battles across space bases, desert wastelands, lava valleys, and abandoned alien ruins!

name: Box #341
description: A quirky box on a journey to find its place in the warehouse, using liquids to gain abilities, solve puzzles, and make new friends on the way!

name: Y.M.C.A.
description: Aliens are invading! Load up your guns and eliminate them with the help of ancient indigenous equipment in your backpack!

name: Jar Head Cauldron
description: Fight monsters from the other side using magical items and weapons crafted in world in order to succeed. Use “In World Crafting” to upgrade weapons and solve puzzles in order to help save your dismembered brothers and sisters by completing the necromantic ritual before their souls are lost forever.

name: Redemption of Liuyin
description: This is a 3D ancient style fantasy, multi ending action role-playing game. As the third installment of the Ryukyu Hidden series and the Ryukyu Hidden Nine Absolute Reincarnation Chapter, the game is designed with the principle of promoting offense and hesitation to defeat in its combat system.

name: Spooky Survivors
description: Spooky Survivors puts you in the shoes of Van Hobo, a quirky hero battling the supernatural! Start with all unlocks BUT choose which to level up as you face endless waves. Equip powerful gear and unlock unique abilities. Outlast the nightmare and prove yourself as the ultimate spooky survivor!

name: Paper 2: Origami Refolded
description: Fold your way through over 100 levels and become an origami master in this casual puzzle game suitable for all ages.

name: Ezrebeth
description: Ezrebeth is an old, bitter recluse who finds herself constantly invaded by her peculiar relatives during the winter holidays. Oh, and she's stuck in a time loop! Investigate, interview and cross-reference as you attempt to figure out what's going on in this surreal visual novel.

name: Fungiman 2
description: Just another adventure with your friendly neighborhood fungus — nothing to worry about… probably?

name: Risk & Riches
description: This roguelite deckbuilder is set in the American West. Battle monsters, cultists, and folkloric creatures while searching for gold and the source of the evil within a mine. You choose when to leave, not where to go. Will you play it safe returning to the surface, or risk it all by going deeper?

name: The Last of the Survivors
description: In "The Last of the Survivors," prepare for zombie battles filled with adrenaline, blood, and realistic physics. Arm yourself and prove your survival skills.

name: 4X4 Progress
description: Choose your desired civilization, design your 4x4 cities with the most efficient layout, and advance your civilization! However, the layout is reset every turn.

name: Odessa
description: A retired bodyguard has to team up with an astute bunny-girl to keep the hope of rescuing his soon-to-be wife, abducted by mysterious individuals. At the same time, a cult around a strange goddess is developing. How could the two things be related? And will he be able to see his beloved one again?

name: Banned Tapes
description: You are a filmmaker and recently purchased a box of VHS tapes at a flea market. Now you need to look through them and select tapes on which occur supernatural, violent, horrifying scenes...

name: Phantom Asylum VR
description: "Phantom Asylum" is a VR horror experience set in an abandoned mental hospital haunted by restless phantoms. Navigate its twisted corridors, where every step could lead you deeper into madness. Can you survive the asylum's secrets, or will you become another ghost trapped within its walls?

name: One Million Stars
description: Get stars, avoid monsters. The rules are simple, but the goal massive. Pilot 4 different ships, choose stackable upgrades, and grab wild powerups in an endless, dynamically generated roguelite arcade space adventure. Take each run as far as you can, banking progress on the road to ONE MILLION STARS.

name: Infinimoes
description: Infinimoes is a space filling puzzle game (like tangrams) involving a variety of polyominoes and sometimes an infinitely repeating space.

name: Game (not) Over
description: GAME (not) OVER is a survivors-like with deck-building elements, blending both genres to offer a fresh game. Lost in the world of video games, use cards to summon hero allies, and defend yourself from the hordes of villains who want to claim their revenge on you!

name: Operation Trick-Or-Treat
description: Operation Trick-Or-Treat is an adventure minigame where the player must complete levels by tracking down all the candy in each, using the innate powers of various Halloween costumes. Can you finish all the levels? For extra challenge, try to find all the hidden coins in each level, or go for a record time.

name: Little Wings Deliveries
description: Embark on a playful adventure with your cozy flying ship. Traverse through floating islands, chat with new friends, and make deliveries. Plan out your routes and find secrets while enjoying the beautiful landscape. As your lungs are filled with air, connect with yourself and discover your compass.

name: Key Gunner
description:
Defeat waves of enemies by typing!

In Key Gunner, you are being attacked by waves and waves of enemies, and the only way to defeat them is by typing the letters floating above their heads!

The stronger the enemy, the more points it is worth. Type the letters in order and you get a bonus. But a typo will lose you points and stop your gun from firing for a short time. Compete for the top score on the high score tables!

name: Rotschwert
description:
Fast-Paced Action Slasher

- Face dozens of strange machines, built for a strange purpose
- Cut through enemies before they can take a shot, or engage from afar by summoning your "friends"
- 4 Segments to traverse, holding vague hints and recollections
- 4 modes of play for experienced and newbie Visitors, each with its own finale
- 2 stranded Rabbits connected by fate
- 1 bedtime story to be told

name: Tomte Trouble
description: Tomte Trouble is a single-screen platformer for the Game Boy Color. Collect all of the tomte and progress through sixteen bite-sized stages.

name: Exit Together
description: Exit Together is a 1-6 player co-op or single-player anomaly loop adventure game. Find anomalies, solve puzzles, and avoid traps. Set in a retro 1960s office atmosphere, observe your surroundings carefully to reach the next room. Will you reach Room 9 and exit, or remain trapped forever in the loop?

name: The Lonely Architect
description:
The Lonely Architect is a 2D atmospheric platformer that delves into the subconscious of an overworked architect struggling with isolation. This debut game from Odaro Eguavoen, solo developer behind Ekosodi Games, started off as a demo which won a Top 25 Finalist position in the ‘Safe In Our World’ 2024 Game Jam.

Using a series of eerie spaces and landscapes, a desolate atmosphere becomes the backdrop to this minimalist game.

name: DAWN: Darkness Awaits Withstand the Night
description: D.A.W.N: Darkness Awaits Withstand the Night is a fast-paced survival game where players face off against a relentless, evolving threat of zombies and reanimated former teammates in an open-ended simulation.

name: Invasion 360
description: Your favorite Arcade Invaders ~ with a Twist!

name: Fishing Clicker
description: It is not easy to catch the best fish the first time. Being a good fisherman requires patience. Start with a small rod and worm. Fish and mysteries will earn you more money. Earn the chance to catch more mysterious and valuable fish with special fishing rods. You should choose your baits well.

name: Hello Girl
description: Have you ever felt like a rabbit with a telephone? Hello Girl is a thrilling kinetic visual novel about connection and disconnection, set during a time of great uncertainty.

name: Through the Edges
description:
Step into a world divided by the enigmatic Spheres, where different races live under strict balance – a balance that has never been questioned… until now.

As the protagonist, an ordinary young person from a remote village, you receive an unexpected invitation to a grand ball. What seems like a stroke of fate soon turns into a revelation of hidden anomalies, ancient powers, and a secret that could shatter reality itself.

But you are not alone.

Meet intriguing characters from various races, each carrying their own secrets, struggles, and desires. Will they become your allies, rivals, or something more? Your choices will shape their destinies – and your own.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Genesis Blast!
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic: Skyline
description: Sin descripción

name: Team Sonic Fighters
description: Sin descripción

name: Gorn 2
description: GORN 2 is a ludicrous sequel to the hit VR gladiator simulator from Free Lives. It's bigger, wilder, and stronger than ever before, with mighty new weapons to wield, treacherous new traps to avoid, and new power-ups to imbue you with supernatural strength. Enjoy GORN 2's improved VR combat as you battle the five sons of the God of the Afterlife across an array of heavenly realms, with in-your-face combat so irresponsibly violent you'll check your headset for blood spatters when you're done.

name: Sonic: StarLight
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Mania: Boss Rush+
description: Sin descripción

name: Bay Breaker
description:
Use your boat's new technology to launch ultra-springy balls,
capable of shattering even the toughest rocks.

name: Breaking Bricks
description: Ready to have some fun? This bundle brings together the XBOX ONE and WINDOWS versions of the BREAKING BRICKS game.

name: Cynthia: Hidden in the Moonshadow - Silver Edition
description: Emotional, 3rd-person, story-driven, adventure game focused on solving puzzles and using stealth mechanics. Use your bow to interact with environmental elements. Sneak, climb or distract guards to move further unnoticed. Solve light puzzles alongside your path to rescue your loved one.

name: Deadside: Deluxe Pack
description: Includes Deadside base game, Supporter Pack DLC, flags set, and all skins.

name: Sonic 1 Delta
description: Sin descripción

name: Three in One
description: Ready to have some fun? This bundle brings together three games released by Yume Game Studio so far for this platform, with a special discount.

name: Sonic Aspect
description: Sin descripción

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - American Muscle
description:
They're going to feel it! With the T14's fast-firing gun and armor protection, you're ready to deliver all the pain in your mid-tier matches.

American Muscle also gives you days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings.

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Ready at the Command
description:
With a Commander assigned to your tank, you're primed to head into battle with an advantage over your enemies. And Margaret LeBlanc is here and awaiting your orders.

Ready at the Command gives you a 3D Commander that you can customize with Skills to optimize your tank's performance, plus valuable Boosters and days of Premium Account to increase your battle earnings.

name: Suikaiju x Red Panda Bundle
description: Red Panda is Hungry + Suikaiju

name: SC Triple Cat Games Bundle
description: Cats with Guns + Super Astro Cats + Nefiriya and the Sand of Eternity

name: Starship Troopers: Extermination - Galactic Victory Edition
description: Squad up and fight for humanity's future in this 16-player online co-op FPS — and get bonus gear for your Trooper in the Galactic Victory Edition!

name: Horde Survival Bundle Xbox: Andromeda, Godsvivors and Farmer Survivors
description: Get ready for intense action and endless battles against swarms of enemies in this special Horde Survivor game bundle!

name: Horde Survival Bundle Xbox: Andromeda Survivors, Beyond Border, Farmer Survivors, Primal Survivors, Shield King
description: Get ready for intense action and endless battles against swarms of enemies in this special Horde Survivor game bundle!

name: Horde Survival Bundle Xbox: Beyond Border, Shield King and Primal Survivors
description: Get ready for intense action and endless battles against swarms of enemies in this special Horde Survivor game bundle!

name: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split Origins Collection
description: Every nightmare has a beginning…

name: Sonic Adventure 2: Super Hard Mode
description: Sin descripción

name: Swingin'
description:
This game was created as a part of the "0 hour game jam", a game jam taking place over the end of Daylight Savings Time, between 2 AM and 2 AM.

Collect blue to increase score, green to get more lives, and avoid red or else you lose lives.

name: Stock Market Tycoon: Challenge
description: A competitive multiplayer real-time stock market investment game where players compete globally to achieve maximum investment returns. Trade live stocks in a simulated economy and manage your portfolio in a real-time virtual stock exchange.

name: To Fight The Sea
description: A game that turned into more of a visual experience than an actual game. Created for Ludum Dare 31, with Cameron Erickson and Mike LeRoy, each contributing so much, with Cameron making the game visually beautiful, and Mike complementing the visuals with ear candy.

name: Synchrobeatings
description:
A game created with Magnus Pålsson and Hannes Rahm for the GMC Jam #17.

In Synchrobeatings, you play the frustrated conductor of an ensemble. It's concert night, and your band No Sync is playing horrifically out of sync. When waving your conductor's stick around doesn't work to get the band in sync, you turn to violence!

name: Studium
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic: Dark Abyss
description: Sin descripción

name: Sol Rush Misadventure
description:
Sol Rush Misadventure is a visual novel about Blaze and Marine going on a treasure hunt on the quest to find the Achlysolis Blade, an ancient treasure hidden for generations.

As Blaze and Marine go together solving various puzzles on their quest, they also build a closer bond to each other. Could this treasure have some link to Blaze's path? Can Marine convince Blaze about the thrill of adventure?

name: Sonic 2.5
description: Sin descripción

name: Soko Banana
description: "Soko Banana" is a puzzle game developed for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES), inspired by the classic Sokoban concept. Players guide the young monkey, Skid, through banana warehouses across five distinct islands, each introducing unique mechanics such as pits, breakable blocks, and teleporters. The objective is to maneuver banana crates to designated exits while collecting bananas to unlock bonus levels. The game offers 55 levels in total, including hidden secrets.

name: Barista Master: Café Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Maisons de repos
description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Yumia: The Alchemist of Memories & the Envisioned Land - Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Big Buck Hunter: Ultimate Trophy - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowling Fever: Discovery Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Darts Fever: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Formula Racing Pro 2025: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Snooker Fever: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Full Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Skyline Bowling: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Spy Guy Cosmos: Cosmos Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Stacky Dash: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tank vs. Tank: Prime Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Train Traffic Manager: GOTY Edition

name: Thin Line
description: A short time before fading away.

name: [REC] Desolation
description: [REC] Desolation takes you to an abandoned manor as journalist Ethan Carter. Your goal is to investigate its dark past and uncover the truth. But some secrets should remain hidden…

name: 18th Floor
description: You are trapped in a virtual abandoned building created by hackers. Find the escape password, or find the real exit.

name: Pueblo
description: Sin descripción

name: Astroloot
description: Astroloot is a cozy sci-fi walking simulator infused with deep ARPG mechanics. Create a build that’s truly your own, as you uncover the dark secrets hidden within the Astroloot Sector.

name: Lockdown Opportunities
description: Sin descripción

name: Wanted: Dead or Alive
description: Step into the Wild West with Wanted: Dead or Alive, a fast-paced puzzle game that will put your observation skills to the test. Your mission: spot the wanted outlaw among a crowd of ever-moving cowboys. As you progress, the challenge intensifies—time speeds up, and a single mistake could cost you your bounty. With its simple yet addictive gameplay, Wanted: Dead or Alive will push your reflexes and focus to the limit. Can you catch all the bandits before they vanish into the crowd?

name: Chaos Faction Legacy Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Zeta
description: Five teams enter the Aran Plateau—one emerges victorious. Bring your squad into the next evolution of the third-person MOBA, blending explosive hero-driven action with dynamic multiteam strategy. Outsmart and outmaneuver your opponents to create your path to victory.

name: Macro Data Refinement Simulator: Shapes
description: The game is a Macro Data Refinement terminal simulator with installed a puzzle game - Shapes. This is the favorite game of the assistant director of the Macro Data Refinement Department, in which the goal is to arrange successive layers of the same shapes. Will you be able to beat Miss H's record?

name: Earth vs. Mars
description: Faced with a terrifying Martian invasion, you must lead Earth’s forces in a battle for our planet’s future. Create powerful human-creature super soldiers to fight an alien menace in this turn-based strategy game.

name: LSD: Dream Emulator Retro
description: Immerse yourself in a dreamy and psychedelic world through low poly enviroments and liminal spaces. A Retro game influenced by the original LSD: Dream Emulator from PSX.

name: Sonic Action
description: Sin descripción

name: Rush and Blush
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic 1: Alt Reality
description: Sin descripción

name: Apex Legends: Takeover
description: There’s no better way to kick off year seven of Apex Legends than upping the heat of battle. Two heavy hitters that have been in the background a bit too long make their way center stage with updates worthy of Apex Predators, and revamped perks raise up the rest of the Assault Class. No weapon is a bad weapon with buffs across the board for every piece that you can get your hands on. This new meta is cooking and it’s safe to say that this anniversary season flips the season of Support to one of aggression. Coupled with some strong updates for Armor and Helmets, greater access to weapons with the new Arsenals, and reduced visual clutter and time-to-kill has never been faster. It’s a whole new Outlands—be ready to fight.

name: Eyes of Hellfire
description: Eyes of Hellfire is a co-op gothic horror game. Hoist the candelabra and, along with your friends, step into the darkened halls of the Hellfire Club.

name: Cosmi: Forbidden Forests
description: A celebration of pioneering 1980s games, this new-and-old collection of classic C64 games originally published by Cosmi includes a special remaster of Forbidden Forest with all new graphics and audio, new comic book stories and remade box art, plus a trove of archival bonus material!

name: Super Miners
description: Descend as a brave miner, face mysterious enemies, overcome traps, and challenge legendary Creatures! Jump, run, mine, and fight! Craft potions, uncover secrets, break the curse, and leave your mark in history!

name: SQR
description: YOU ARE SQR. PART OF YOU IS MISSING.

name: Control Room
description: The game is a simple 2D platform action game with roguelite elements.You play a game in a certain room. You can avoid enemies from all around you and survive for 5 minutes to clear the game. You have to control various events, and every time you start the game you will discover something new.

name: Interstellar Escape
description: Absurd story,Rouge-like design,Asymmetric confrontation. A space themed,Rouge-like,Simulated escape,absurd style game. Players control characters to run,jump,choose,collect,solve puzzles (levels) to explore planets,use strategies to fight against enemies,and finally achieve clearance.

name: Turtle Riders: Adventure Begins
description: Ride giant turtles and aim your weapons at hordes of enemies chasing you while you gather as many resources as you can. Pick your upgrades carefully and create strong builds to survive the long road to the Outpost!

name: Jirai the Red Panda
description: Meet Jirai the Red Panda! Explore a world filled with cute pixel animals. Jirai the Red Panda is a game about friendship, exploration, and slime? In this pixel platformer game you'll have to run, jump and dash your way through challenging platforming levels and boss battles.

name: Sonic Metal Memories
description: Sin descripción

name: WarOS
description: Step into the world of galactic combat in "WarOS", a Chinese sci-fi game! It creates its own structure, integrating the core gameplay of RTS with the details, plot and growth system of RPG, simplifying complex micro-manipulation, and making the game experience both fun and exhilarating.

name: Sonic Other World
description: Sin descripción

name: Liminal Department
description: Trapped in what seems to be an endless hospital department. Carefully observe your surroundings in each loop to escape the Liminal Department

name: Zirquitz
description: ZIRQUITZ is a chill yet deep graph-building game. Build and optimize an evolving graph of nodes to produce “Work,” your resource for upgrades and expansion. Discover synergy, power up your network, and unlock endless potential!

name: Sorting Inc
description: A casual and relaxing game about sorting various items. Join Sorting Inc and climb up through the departments to become the absolute expert in the field of sorting.

name: Sonic Pinball Panic!
description: Sin descripción

name: Condemned: No Escape
description: Condemned: No Escape is an adventure puzzle game inspired by the Game Boy era. Explore a mysterious place filled with destructive platforms, traps, and holes. Use your wits and precise jumps to collect keys, unlock paths, and uncover secrets as you try to escape.

name: Isopod Keeping Simulator
description: Grow, feed and care for your colony of adorable isopods in this realistic semi-idle simulator. Watch your isopods multiply and split or sell your colony if they become too numerous. Created by the Kunstaat community, 100% of our proceeds support charity!
